title: Šoderica
text: Šoderica is a <a href="lake">lake</a> in northern <a href="Croatia">Croatia</a>, formed by the river <a href="Drava">Drava</a>, near <a href="Drnje">Drnje</a>, <a href="Botovo%2C%20Croatia">Botovo</a>, and <a href="%C4%90elekovec">Đelekovec</a> in <a href="Koprivnica-Kri%C5%BEevci%20County">Koprivnica-Križevci County</a>.
